results.title: Perianesthetic refractory anaphylactic shock with cefuroxime in a patient with history of penicillin allergy on multiple antihypertensive medications.
results.text_hl: We report a case of perianesthetic refractory @DISEASE_Anaphylaxis @DISEASE_MESH:D000707 @@@anaphylactic shock@@@ with @CHEMICAL_Cefuroxime @CHEMICAL_MESH:D002444 @@@cefuroxime@@@ in a @SPECIES_9606 @@@patient@@@ with history of @<m>DISEASE_Meningitis_Pneumococcal</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D008586 @@@penicillin allergy@@@ on regular therapy with @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@, @CHEMICAL_Losartan @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019808 @@@losartan@@@, @CHEMICAL_Prazosin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D011224 @@@prazosin@@@ and @CHEMICAL_Nicardipine @CHEMICAL_MESH:D009529 @@@nicardipine@@@.

citations.NLM: Nag DS, Samaddar DP, Kant S, Mahanty PR. Perianesthetic refractory anaphylactic shock with cefuroxime in a patient with history of penicillin allergy on multiple antihypertensive medications. Braz J Anesthesiol. 2017 Mar-Apr;67(2):217-220. PMID: 28236873
citations.BibTeX: @article{28236873, title={Perianesthetic refractory anaphylactic shock with cefuroxime in a patient with history of penicillin allergy on multiple antihypertensive medications.}, author={Nag DS and Samaddar DP and Kant S and Mahanty PR}, journal={Braz J Anesthesiol}, volume={67}, number={2}, pages={217-220}}

results.title: [Perianesthetic refractory anaphylactic shock with cefuroxime in a patient with history of penicillin allergy on multiple antihypertensive medications].
results.text_hl: We report a case of perianesthetic refractory @DISEASE_Anaphylaxis @DISEASE_MESH:D000707 @@@anaphylactic shock@@@ with @CHEMICAL_Cefuroxime @CHEMICAL_MESH:D002444 @@@cefuroxime@@@ in a @SPECIES_9606 @@@patient@@@ with history of @<m>DISEASE_Meningitis_Pneumococcal</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D008586 @@@penicillin allergy@@@ on regular therapy with @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@, @CHEMICAL_Losartan @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019808 @@@losartan@@@, @CHEMICAL_Prazosin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D011224 @@@prazosin@@@ and @CHEMICAL_Nicardipine @CHEMICAL_MESH:D009529 @@@nicardipine@@@.

citations.NLM: Nag DS, Samaddar DP, Kant S, Mahanty PR. [Perianesthetic refractory anaphylactic shock with cefuroxime in a patient with history of penicillin allergy on multiple antihypertensive medications]. Rev Bras Anestesiol. 2017 Mar-Apr;67(2):217-220. PMID: 25746334
